attributes.action: Make Sex Education a curriculum lesson like Maths, Science, English etc
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Lack of sex education is causing this country to become infested in diseases, especially HIV. Teen pregnancies. I left school only three years ago, where I was (in a pleasant town) did not have sex education except for an hour in all the years at secondary school.

Create a proper time-tabled lesson every week all through school about diseases, what happens, biology on the body and the dieases, how to use contraception, the difference between. Teens are naive to think the pill will stop diseases. 

Our health is the most important thing.

SAVE THIS COUNTRY NOW BEFORE ITS TOO LATE!!
